item.name: Quest System

request.description: Generate a new quest for specific developer level using AI
Generate quests for all 8 developer levels for the current week
Auto-generate weekly quests (cron job endpoint)
Get all active quests, optionally filtered by developer level
Get quest details by quest ID
Stake user for a quest during staking period (wallet address optional)
Submit solution for a quest during challenge period
Get quest leaderboard with rankings and scores
Get user's quest participation history with pagination
Update quest statuses based on schedule (admin/cron)
Send scheduled quest notifications (admin/cron)
Process quest results and determine winners (admin)
Bulk process all quests in closed status (admin)
Update user's wallet address for crypto rewards

item.description: AI-powered quest system with difficulty-scaled challenges and crypto rewards for all 8 developer levels

item.name: Boss Battle System
Boss Battle Management

request.description: Create AI-generated personalized boss battle - analyzes user's GitHub profile, coding strengths, and generates challenge one level above current developer level using Pollinations.ai

item.name: Create Boss Battle for Advanced User

request.description: Create boss battle for advanced developer - AI will generate more complex challenges based on higher skill level
Get detailed information about a specific boss battle including problem statement and boss characteristics
Start the boss battle and change status from 'initiated' to 'facing'
Submit solution for boss battle (max 3 attempts, 72-hour time limit)
Submit advanced algorithm solution - AI evaluates correctness, efficiency, code quality, and boss challenge requirements
Submit a well-crafted solution designed to score 85-95 points with AI evaluation - includes optimal algorithm, error handling, and clean code structure
Submit an inefficient solution to test AI evaluation - should score 50-65 points due to O(n) complexity and poor code quality

item.description: Core boss battle management endpoints with AI-powered creation and evaluation

item.name: AI Evaluation Testing

request.description: Test AI evaluation with perfect code - should score 90-100 points. Includes optimal algorithm, comprehensive error handling, documentation, and modular design.
Test AI evaluation with good code - should score 75-85 points. Functional solution with basic error handling but room for optimization.
Test AI evaluation with poor code - should score 40-60 points. O(n) complexity, no error handling, inefficient algorithm.
Test AI evaluation with broken code - should score 0 points and be marked as INVALID. Contains syntax errors and won't execute properly.
Test AI validation with wrong logic - should score 0 points and be marked as INVALID because it fails test cases despite being syntactically correct.

item.description: Test AI-only validation and evaluation system. Solutions must pass ALL test cases to be valid. Invalid solutions score 0 points regardless of code quality.

item.name: User Boss Battle Data

query.description: Filter by status: initiated, facing, won, lost, expired

request.description: Get user's boss battle history with summary statistics

query.description: Get all boss battles regardless of status

request.description: Get all user's boss battles with complete history and statistics
Get user's currently active boss battles that are in progress
Get user's perks, badges, titles, experience points, and achievements from boss battles

item.description: User-specific boss battle data and achievements

query.description: Number of top players to return

request.description: Get boss battle leaderboard with top performers, battles won, and average scores
Get weekly boss battle leaderboard for recent performance
Admin endpoint to cleanup expired boss battles (72+ hours old)

item.description: Epic AI-powered boss battle system using Pollinations.ai for challenge generation and solution evaluation. Features personalized challenges one level above user's current developer level, intelligent scoring (correctness, efficiency, code quality, boss requirements), detailed AI feedback, 72-hour time limit, and max 3 attempts. Each solution is evaluated by AI for precise scoring and constructive feedback.
